0.0: After a Charged Attack hits an opponent, a Sunfire Arrow will descend and deal 60% ATK as DMG. After a Sunfire Arrow hits an opponent, it will increase the Charged Attack DMG taken by this opponent from the wielder by 28%. A Sunfire Arrow can be triggered once every 12s.

1.0: After a Charged Attack hits an opponent, a Sunfire Arrow will descend and deal 75% ATK as DMG. After a Sunfire Arrow hits an opponent, it will increase the Charged Attack DMG taken by this opponent from the wielder by 35%. A Sunfire Arrow can be triggered once every 12s.

2.0: After a Charged Attack hits an opponent, a Sunfire Arrow will descend and deal 90% ATK as DMG. After a Sunfire Arrow hits an opponent, it will increase the Charged Attack DMG taken by this opponent from the wielder by 42%. A Sunfire Arrow can be triggered once every 12s.

3.0: After a Charged Attack hits an opponent, a Sunfire Arrow will descend and deal 105% ATK as DMG. After a Sunfire Arrow hits an opponent, it will increase the Charged Attack DMG taken by this opponent from the wielder by 49%. A Sunfire Arrow can be triggered once every 12s.

4.0: After a Charged Attack hits an opponent, a Sunfire Arrow will descend and deal 120% ATK as DMG. After a Sunfire Arrow hits an opponent, it will increase the Charged Attack DMG taken by this opponent from the wielder by 56%. A Sunfire Arrow can be triggered once every 12s.
